name: Breeze Banana Bread
author: Almond Breeze
summary: This classic banana bread has great flavor and texture with the addition of Almond Breeze Almondmilk and a bit of almond flour.
ingredients: ¼ cup Almond Breeze Vanilla almondmilk
½ cup lightly packed fine almond flour
¼ cup Blue Diamond Honey Roasted Almonds
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F and coat 2 mini loaf pans with nonstick spray
Whisk together bananas, sugar, Almond Breeze, oil, extract, and egg in a large bowl
Stir together dry ingredients and add to banana mixture, stirring just until dry ingredients are incorporated
Spoon equal amounts into prepared pans and bake for 40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean
Let cool before removing from pans
